title: UFO expert reveals why you're more likely to see an 'alien' over Christmas
description: In December, the UFO Reporting Centre see a huge surge in UFO sightings with a massive spike on Christmas Day.

title: Prime's UFO doco is the same old story but with shiny new faces
description: OPINION: The truth may well be out there thanks to all these interviews with government insiders on alien technology but the conspiracy theory rabbit hole still leads to the same places.

title: Kecksburg UFO incident 60 years ago put Westmoreland County community on the map
description: It was the time of year when children would look to the heavens to see if they could spot Rudolph’s red nose or their parents would sing about a star shining in the east beyond them far. But as the sun was disappearing over the horizon on Dec. 9, 1965, a Thursday, people across several [...]

title: Footage Of Bizarre Aircraft Over California Goes Viral – But It's Not A UFO
description: While a strange craft resembling two passenger jets fused together was recently spotted over California, it's not a UFO (or UAP if you prefer).
